name: Bay Scallop Chowder
author: Kathy J. Bourdess
summary: Excellent chowder for the holidays. This recipe can also be made with other seafood.
directions: In a large pot over high heat, combine the chicken broth, carrot, celery, onion, potatoes, thyme, parsley, salt and ground black pepper and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium low and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes
Transfer mixture to a food processor or blender, puree until smooth and set aside
In the same pot over medium heat, saute the mushrooms and scallops in the butter or margarine for 2 to 3 minutes
Add the wine and reserved puree mixture to the pot, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer
In a separate small bowl, combine the egg yolk and heavy cream
Mix well and add to the soup
Continue simmering over low heat, stirring occasionally for 10 to 15 minutes
